rules: This is a full-stack startup template with backend (Python/FastAPI), frontend (Next.js/TypeScript), mobile (React Native), and Supabase.
Follow the existing code patterns and structure in each directory.
Use TypeScript for frontend and mobile code, Python for backend code.
Maintain consistency with existing naming conventions and file organization.
Any documentation created aside from README.md and SETUP.md must be added to the documentation folder as markdown files.
